Posts.Title: Thinking & Remembering My Mother In Law

Posts.Content:
hi all. My sis-in-law introduced me to this site. my mother in law is fighting a mean round of cancer. she lives in maryland and we live in iowa. we see each other once per year but are in constant contact and are very close. distance has not made us less close. we do feel however, helpless in the sense that we cannot be there to be a lending hand, a shoulder to cry on, give encouraging words and help out more. the distance thing bothers me; although i know that that's how it is and that they would never think another thing about
 it...that's just how it is.
Posts.Title: Mom in law like my Mom
I'm losing her fast and it hurts
I'm losing her fast and it hurts

Posts.Content: We got the news that my mother in law---that lives 1200 miles from us    is going to be on a new mix of chemo/drugs to fight that demon cancer she has. But it is a new day...and we have renewed faith and hope; as God heard our prayers and we are hopeful that these new drugs will make her feel better and start seeing improvement in her day to day recovery.  We've never given up, been scared so bad we can't sleep or focus on much else sometimes but never ever gave up.  Please keep my mother in law Anna Mae in your prayers. Thanks!
Posts.Title: A new day--and renewed hope and faith
